question: Which organisation operates the 'FASTag' in India?
explanation:
National Highways Authority of India (NHAI), a Government owned organisation operates the electronic toll collection system named FASTag in India. NHAI has recently stated that FASTag users in the country have reached 2 crore mark.
The FASTag has registered more than 400% growth this year. The payment is made digitally through the FASTag linked to the bank wallet.
